title: Dark Desert
paragraph: Something evil is going on in this region. A strong desire towards the Crater of Immortality drives the restless creatures of this island.

dynamicContents.content: The Dark Desert is the only island to recruit the strong {{Athlas # article/units/athlas }}. {{ Pangoans # article/units/pangoan }} are on the island too.

The ash fields and fiery desert fields are strong guarded by the athlas. But the most interesting thing on this island are the four control fields located on the edge of the island, which are very important to fight for the {{ COI # article/islands/crater-of-immortality }} and the primordial artifact, the strongest type of artifact your team can get.
